reasoning:

Analysis:


My earlier Straight generated 3,321 chips against a Boss Blind, well exceeding what I need now. Even my Two Pair came close at 1,566 chips. Since Diamonds are debuffed, I'll focus on Clubs to maximize Onyx Agate's synergy while relying on Popcorn's multiplier. I should be able to generate the required chips with my current setup.

The Investment Tag will net me $34 total after this round ($25 from the tag plus $5 reward). The Devil could enhance a Gold Card to earn $3 if held at round's end, but that's not essential right now. I'll proceed with playing the round since my track record shows I can handle this Boss Blind.
